title: Design a URL Preview Service
description: The URL Preview Service is designed to provide a preview of the content contained within a given URL, allowing users to quickly understand the topic and relevance of the page without having to visit it.

title: Design a Rate Limiter
description: A Rate Limiter controls the number of requests a user or service can make to an API within a specified time frame, preventing abuse and ensuring fair resource usage.

title: Design a Notification System
description: A Notification System delivers real-time or scheduled messages to users via email, SMS, or push notifications, ensuring timely and reliable communication.

title: Design a Food Delivery System
description: A Food Delivery System connects restaurants, customers, and delivery personnel, enabling seamless order placement, tracking, and delivery.

title: Design a Logging System
description: A Logging System captures, stores, and analyzes logs from various services to monitor system health, debug issues, and ensure operational reliability.

title: Design a Video Streaming Service
description: A Video Streaming Service delivers high-quality video content to users with minimal latency, supporting adaptive bitrate streaming and global accessibility.

title: Design a Web Crawler
description: A Web Crawler systematically browses the internet to index web pages, respecting robots.txt and handling large-scale data extraction.

title: Design a Payment Gateway
description: A Payment Gateway securely processes online payments, ensuring compliance with standards like PCI-DSS and handling multiple payment methods.

title: Design a File Sharing Service like Google Drive
description: A File Sharing Service enables users to store, share, and collaborate on files with real-time synchronization and robust access controls.

title: Design an Online IDE
description: An Online IDE provides a browser-based environment for writing, compiling, and running code, supporting multiple languages and collaborative features.

title: Design a Travel Booking System
description: A Travel Booking System allows users to search, book, and manage travel arrangements like flights, hotels, and car rentals.

title: Design a System like Uber
description: A Ride-Sharing System like Uber matches drivers with passengers, providing real-time tracking, pricing, and payment processing.

title: Design a System like WhatsApp
description: A Messaging System like WhatsApp supports real-time, secure communication with text, voice, and multimedia capabilities.

title: Design a Twitter Feed
description: A Twitter Feed system curates and delivers real-time posts to users based on their interests, followers, and engagement.

title: Design an API Rate Limiter
description: An API Rate Limiter restricts the number of API calls a client can make within a time window to prevent overuse and ensure fair access.

title: Design a Hotel Management System
description: A Hotel Management System handles room bookings, guest services, billing, and inventory for efficient hotel operations.

title: Design a Load Balancer
description: A Load Balancer distributes incoming network traffic across multiple servers to ensure high availability and performance.

title: Design a Parking Lot System
description: A Parking Lot System manages vehicle parking, tracking available spots, and handling payments for parking services.

title: Design an Email Service
